          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le premier quartier de la lune</string>
            <string language="en">First quarter Moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstes Viertel Mond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lua do primeiro quarto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luna del primo trimestre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φεγγάρι των πρώτων τριμήνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luna del primer trimestre</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les positions du soleil, de la lune et de la terre pendant quand la lune est à son premier quartier.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the positions of the Sun, Moon and Earth during the first quarter phase of the Moon.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Positionen der Sonne, 
des Mondes und der Masse während der Phase des ersten Viertels des 
Mondes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as posições do sol, da
lua e da terra durante a fase do primeiro quarto da lua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le posizioni del 
sole, della luna e della terra durante la fase del primo trimestre 
della luna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις θέσεις του ήλιου, του
φεγγαριού και της γης κατά τη διάρκεια της φάσης των πρώτων 
τριμήνων του φεγγαριού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las posiciones del sol, 
de la luna y de la tierra durante la fase del primer trimestre de la 
luna.</string>
